templates.name: Science Fiction
templates.author: gemDirect1 System
templates.description: Sci-fi narratives with futuristic settings, advanced technology, and non-human characters
mandatory_elements: Advanced technology (AI, VR, nanotech, quantum computing, genetic engineering, etc.)
Space/alien element (starfield, alien creature, exoplanet, dimensional rift, etc.)
Non-human character or post-human being (android, AI, uplifted animal, etc.)
Scientific principle applied in speculative way (time dilation, parallel universe, etc.)
Futuristic architecture or landscape (megacity, O'Neill cylinder, underwater dome, etc.)
templates.color_palette: Cool blues, electric purples, metallic silvers
templates.notes: Best for space exploration, AI narratives, dystopian futures, first-contact scenarios

templates.name: Drama
templates.author: gemDirect1 System
templates.description: Character-driven narratives with emotional authenticity and relationship dynamics
templates.tone: Intimate, emotionally authentic, grounded in character
mandatory_elements: Character's internal conflict made visible (pacing, fidgeting, expression, stillness)
Relationship dynamic (two+ characters navigating tension, affection, or estrangement)
Physical space that reflects emotional state (messy room, sterile office, rain-soaked street)
Dialogue that reveals character rather than explains plot
Moment of vulnerability (character admits fear, desire, regret, or hope)
templates.color_palette: Warm naturals, muted earth tones, dramatic shadows
templates.notes: Best for character-driven narratives, relationship conflicts, moral dilemmas, personal growth

templates.name: Thriller
templates.author: gemDirect1 System
templates.description: High-stakes action narratives with suspense, time pressure, and forced choices
mandatory_elements: Countdown/time pressure (timer ticking, deadline passing, window closing)
Physical danger (pursuit, entrapment, weapon threat, environmental hazard)
Information asymmetry (character doesn't know what audience knows or vice versa)
Forced choice with bad consequences either way
Betrayal or revelation that upends assumptions
templates.color_palette: Shadows and highlights, desaturated with color pops, asymmetric framing
threat_taxonomy: Psychological: Paranoia, loss of trust, guilt, fear of failure
Social: Reputation at stake, ally becomes enemy, isolation from help
Informational: Wrong people know wrong secrets, misinformation
Moral: Must do something unethical to survive, sacrificing principles
templates.notes: Best for high-stakes action, suspense narratives, cat-and-mouse games, moral traps

version_history.changes: Initial release with sci-fi, drama, thriller templates
